question: A friend of yours is thinking about applying for the same course that you did at university. He/She asked for your advice about studying this subject.Write a letter to ur friend and in ur letterGive details of course you took at universityExplain why you recommend the universityGive some advice about how to apply
text: I hope you and your family are in good spirits. I couldn't write to you any sooner because I was up against a deadline at work. Speaking of which, I received your letter recently that you had written to enquire about the course I did at the University of Delhi in the year 2018.

First of all, it is a course in the area of accounting and economics and it's a popular choice amongst students, who are planning to go for an MBA in the future. What's more, it's a one-year course filled with tons of assignments and two (2) semesters in total. Before completing the course, you will be asked to undergo an internship program with an accounting firm for a period of 2 months.

In my opinion, this course is a must because it teaches you a lot about how businesses operate in the real world by dent of internships and case studies. Also, you will get to meet many great minds while studying at the campus.
You may apply for this course by visiting the campus in New Delhi or online. Do call me on my cellular device in case of questions.
I wish for your bright future ahead.
